title: Cinnamon rolls
ingredients: ['15g (1/2 oz) dried active baking yeast', '7 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 tablespoon salt', '450ml (16 fl oz) warm water (45 C)', '800g (1 3/4 lb) plain flour, divided', '2 eggs', '5 tablespoons vegetable oil', '8 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 dessertspoon ground cinnamon']
